_header: On all souls day men shall let sing and read
Note: For other MSS see 362; for the version in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle see 5690.
Title(s): South English Legendary ; All Souls’ Day
_description: All Souls’ Day, in one MS of the South English Legendary

Lam223.First Lines:
ON all sowlen day men shal lete synge & redeAnd her bedes
                    bidden & done almes dede…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Now Ihesu þat vs dere boȝt þogh we ofte done
                    amysOf all cristen soules haue mercy & bringe vs to þi blisse
                    Amen
